column.value: select * from etr_tb_message where MSG_STS_CD in ('SUBMITTED') and cre_dt > sysdate -14 and msg_document_id not like '%INVALID%'

changeSet.sql: update ETR_TB_TRANSACTION set TRA_NAME = TRA_NAME || '_INACTIVE', TRA_REQ_LOCAL_NAME = TRA_REQ_LOCAL_NAME || '_INACTIVE', TRA_NAMESPACE = TRA_NAMESPACE || '_INACTIVE' where TRA_VERSION like '0.%'

CRED_ID in (select EDP_CRED_ID from ETR_TB_ENDPOINT EDP, ETR_TB_ENDPOINT_WS EDP_WS where EDP.EDP_ID = EDP_WS.ID)
